channel.title: Kingdomhearts client
channel.description:
kingdomhearts is my other source and client i dont think i will ever relese the soruce but here's the client please dont be mad for my work here are new pictures: [url=http://"http://imageshack.us"][img]http://img402.imageshack.us/img402/3228/pic1pj0.png[/img][/url] This is when its loading. Depending on what your internet service you have. It should load pretty fast. (Roadrunner or At&t recommended) [url=http://"http://imageshack.us"][img]http://img182.imageshack.us/img182/9727/pic2rb6.png[/img][/url] This is welcome screen. Basic welcome screen. [url=http://"http://imageshack.us"][img]http://img293.imageshack.us/img293/4965/pic3xp5.png[/img][/url] this is the about page. Made by me. Basically it reads, "Please enjoy the cleint, Do not leech! Have a good day!"
Instuctions for the welcome screen: 1. Click about to find out about kingdomhearts 2. Click login to login to you disired server
Instucitions on login:
1. Type your username then, press enter 2. type in your password 3. either press ok or press enter, and type the disired server ip.
Then, finally. to download this awesome client. [url=http://files.filefront.com/Kingdomhearts+Clientrar/;11319569;/fileinfo.html"]Click here[/url] [url=http://uppit.com/ASQPA3]Or Uppit (recemmended) Here[/url]
NOTE: Done and updated :) project deforced :) sorry about not much info i got to go now goodbye and happy coding you guys. ;)

kingdomhearts is my other source and client i dont think i will ever relese the soruce but here’s the client please dont be mad for my work
here are new pictures:

This is when its loading. Depending on what your internet service you have. It should load pretty fast. (Roadrunner or At&t recommended)

This is welcome screen. Basic welcome screen.

this is the about page. Made by me. Basically it reads, “Please enjoy the cleint, Do not leech! Have a good day!”

Instuctions for the welcome screen:

  1. Click about to find out about kingdomhearts
  2. Click login to login to you disired server

Instucitions on login:

  1. Type your username then, press enter
  2. type in your password
  3. either press ok or press enter, and type the disired server ip.

Then, finally. to download this awesome client. Click here
